segments.text: I can't quite believe what I'm witnessing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scene right out of a slapstick comedy, almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is impressive in its continuous flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's obliviousness is on a grand scale; it's almost absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, and she's justâ€¦drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the kids, engaged in their secret cookie operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to stage a dramatic exit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of intense fear for the boy's safety up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scenario is going to end in a splash, a crash, and tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of soggy cabinets and a slippery floor makes me shudder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to have a very bad day when all this is discovered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone is okay when the inevitable happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wild, uncontrolled mess in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR
